tool.description: Displays a link with an annotation. URL and initial annotation can be set by admin, tool maintain user can change the annotation

mutableConfig.TargetPageName: [Target Page Name - will be used as the label for the link to the URL]
mutableConfig.desp: [Change this text when configuring the tool. It should give some idea of the purpose of the URL and prompt the tool maintain user to change this annotation via the tool menu if needed]

registeredConfig.TargetPageName: [Target Page Name - will be used as the label for the link to the URL]
registeredConfig.desp: [Change this text when configuring the tool. It should give some idea of the purpose of the URL and prompt the tool maintain user to change this annotation via the tool menu if needed]

tool.title: AnnotatedUrl
